DOC.brief_title: Delta Primary Care Provider ( PCP ) Survey Asthma Management
DOC.detailed_description: Study Design . Primary care provider send provider packet include cover letter explain survey purpose well 2-part questionnaire include nine select short patient vignette questionnaire regard personal practice characteristic . Study Population . Individuals receive survey primary care provider identify study participant enrol ongoing study entitle , `` Asthma Delta Region Arkansas : Characterization Disease Impact Environmental Factors '' ( ARIA # 53054 ) . We send survey identify practitioner Lee , Phillips , Desha , Chicot , St. Francis , surround county . Future study include primary care provider Arkansas Delta county pending funding . Inclusion/Exclusion Criteria . We send survey identify practitioner Lee , Phillips , Desha , Chicot , St. Francis , surround county . Future study include primary care provider Arkansas Delta county pending funding . Instruments . Delta Primary Care Provider Survey . The self administer survey examines attitude , perception practice primary care provider . The 2-part questionnaire include nine select short patient vignette questionnaire regard provider personal practice characteristic .
